title: Can your pipeline be used for paired end reads with gaps?
body:
Hello,

I am interested to confirm an allele frequency for a SNV in BRAF gene using amplicon sequencing data. The length of amplicon is 271bp, and paired reads are 101X2. So there is a gap between them. I am wondering whether your pipeline can be used in my case? I see your input is one bam file, what tools/steps do you recommend to align the fastq files to reference genome?

Thank you very much,
Wendy

title: illumina design studio amplicon seq question
body:
Hello,

Thanks for the great workflow. I'm about to test the tool but wanted to know that if it is okay to exclude `AmpliconStart` and `AmpliconEnd` (not avail for us)

Is there any work around for this? Or would it be okay if I add some arbitrary bps for primer sequences and try it?

Best,
JKim
